page.title: 08FAMILY HOMES IN EDALE
page.content: {66 families live in houses , 23 live in working farmhouses , 12 live in bungalows and 5 live in flats . {HOW LONG WE HAVE LIVED HERE More than 200 years_17 families. 100-200 years_5 families. 50-100 years_24 families. 20-30 years_11 families. 10-20 years_21 families. less than 10 years_23 families. {WHY PEOPLE LIVE HERE People who live in Edale but do not work here gave as their reasons for living here that they like living in a pleasant place in the country.Some live here because other family members live here some were brought here by marriage and some by retirement.{ {HOLIDAY HOMES} There are about 11 houses only occasionally occupied.
